historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) repeal of section, see § 401(f) of Board of Ethics and Government Accountability Establishment and Comprehensive Ethics Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2012 (D.C. Act 19-298, January 29, 2012, 59 DCR 683).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-104, see notes following § 1-1151.01.

For history of Law 19-124, see notes under § 1-122.

DC CODE § 1-1151.06

Current through December 11, 2012

chapter.text: Election Campaigns; Lobbying; Conflict of Interest. [Repealed]

heading.catch_text: Time limit for the operation of an exploratory committee. [Repealed]
